Business Policies: THE GOLDEN RULE Our philosophy for customer service doesn't stop when we turn the lights off at the office. We follow the GOLDEN RULE in life: treat others as they WANT to be treated! It's that simple. Additional Terms In the unlikely event there is an issue with our inventory, you will be provided the option of an immediate refund or substitution.
